column1: #Text=Zhao says : " So this is the great Avatar .
#Text=Untie me and I 'll fight you right now !
#Text=Tell me , how does it feel to be the only airbender left ?
#Text=Do n't worry , you wo n't be killed like they were .
#Text=See , if you die you will just be reborn and the Fire Nation would have to start searching all over again .
#Text=So I 'll keep you alive , but just barely .
#Text=Blow all the wind you want , but your situation is futile .
#Text=There is no escaping this fortress , and no one is coming to rescue you .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Water ... " Katara says : " Momo should be back any minute .
#Text=Aang , what in the world is taking you so long ?
